title: The provisions for implementing in-situ rehabilitation scheme, of the said Regulations shall not apply to slum areas existing on any lands earmarked as Hill Tops / Hill Slopes, Green Belts, River or Nallah beds including those falling in blue flood line, Canal banks, No Development Zone in the Development Plan, in Open Spaces of approved layouts and slums on lands required for vital public purpose or on hazardous locations
clause_text: The provisions for implementing in-situ rehabilitation scheme, of the said Regulations shall not apply to slum areas existing on any lands earmarked as Hill Tops / Hill Slopes, Green Belts, River or Nallah beds including those falling in blue flood line, Canal banks, No Development Zone in the Development Plan, in Open Spaces of approved layouts and slums on lands required for vital public purpose or on hazardous locations. Such slums are to be evicted on priority.
section: The Slums On Non Buildable Area / Reservations :
